name: Pantoran_Assembly_Representative
content: A Pantoran Assembly Representative was a politician and representative of the Pantoran Assembly, the governing body of the moon Pantora, a member of the Galactic Republic. When Chi Cho, Chairman of the Assembly, declared a war on the Talz people of Orto Plutonia, Pantoran Senator Riyo Chuchi contacted the Assembly for help. The Assembly Representative reported to Chuchi via hologram that the actions of Chairman Cho were out of order, and authorized the Senator Chuchi to introduce a peaceful resolution with the Talz.
